    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c0840c25-9be2-4cb8-a507-a3d71a67047a#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A gyökér hossz- és keresztmetszete</string>
            <string language="en">Root's longitudinal- and cross-cut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwurzelten Längs und Kreuz-schneiden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ont enraciné longitudinal et croix-coupent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enraizaram longitudinal e cruz-cortaram-no</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hanno sradicato longitudinale e traversa-tagliano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρίζας διαμήκους - και διαγώνιος-αποκοπή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arraigaron longitudinal y cruz-cortan</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A gyökér hossz- és keresztmetszetét ábrázoló rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing illustrating root's longitudinal- and cross-cut</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gyökér,  gyökérsüveg,  nyúlási zóna,  felszívási zóna,  </string>
            <string language="en">root, calyptra, elongational zone, absorptional zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Zeichnen, der Längs Wurzel veranschaulichend
und Kreuz-schnitt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le dessin illustrant la racine longitudinale et 
croix-a coupé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhar ilustrando a raiz longitudinal e 
cruz-cortou</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare illustrando la radice longitudinale e 
traversa-ha tagliato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός επεξηγώντας της ρίζας διαμήκους - και την 
διαγώνιος-αποκοπή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trazar ilustrando la raíz longitudinal y 
cruz-corto'</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzel, calyptra, elongational Zone, absorptional Zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racine, calyptra, zone d'elongational, zone 
d'absorptional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raiz, calyptra, zona do elongational, zona do 
absorptional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radice, calyptra, zona di elongational, zona di 
absorptional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρίζα, calyptra, ζώνη elongational, ζώνη absorptional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">raíz, calyptra, zona del elongational, zona del 
absorptional</string>
          </keyword>
